tool.name: CoMEt
tool.description: CoMEt is a stochastic algorithm for identifying collections of mutually exclusive alterations in cohorts of sequenced tumor samples.
tool.command:
mkdir outdir; awk 'BEGIN {FS=OFS="\t"} \$37 ~ /p\.[^=]/ && \$1 != "" {print \$1, \$16}' $maf > mat1.txt; sort -u -k2,2 mat1.txt > mat2.txt; awk 'BEGIN {FS=OFS="\t"} BEGIN {patient=""} \$2 != patient {patient=\$2} \$2 != patient{ printf "\n" patient "\t" \$1} \$2 == patient {printf "\t" \$1}' mat2.txt > mut_mat.txt;
\$ANACONDA_ROOT_DIR/bin/python2.7 \$COMET_INSTALL_DIR/run_comet_full.py -o outdir -m mut_mat.txt -np $num_perm -ks $gene_set_sizes
#if $advancedsettings.min_freq -mf $advancedsettings.min_freq #end if
#if $advancedsettings.patient_file -pf $advancedsettings.patient_file #end if
#if $advancedsettings.gene_file -gf $advancedsettings.gene_file #end if
#if $advancedsettings.num_iter -N $advancedsettings.num_iter #end if
#if $advancedsettings.n_stop -NStop $advancedsettings.num_stop #end if
#if $advancedsettings.step_length -s $advancedsettings.step_length #end if
#if $advancedsettings.init_soln -init $advancedsettings.init_soln #end if
#if $advancedsettings.num_init -r $advancedsettings.num_init #end if
#if $advancedsettings.dist_cut -tv $advancedsettings.dist_cut #end if
#if $advancedsettings.exact_cut --exact_cut $advancedsettings.exact_cut #end if
#if $advancedsettings.binom_cut --binom_cut $advancedsettings.binom_cut #end if
#if $advancedsettings.co_occur_cut --nt $advancedsettings.co_occur_cut #end if ;
mv outdir/comet-results/results/*.tsv $res;

param.name: maf
param.label: MAF file
param.help: MAF file containing variants. Non-synonymous variants will be parsed.

param.name: num_perm
param.label: Number of permutations
param.help: Number of permuted matrices to use.

param.name: gene_set_sizes
param.label: Gene set sizes
param.help: List of gene set size integers(e.g., 2 3 5).

param.name: patient_file
param.label: Patient whitelist
param.help: List of patients to be included.

param.name: gene_file
param.label: Gene whitelist
param.help: List of genes to be included.

param.name: n_stop
param.label: Maximum number of iterations
param.help: Number of iterations of MCMC to stop the pipeline.

param.name: init_soln
param.label: Initial solutions
param.help: List of initial solutions to use.

param.name: num_init
param.label: Number of initial solutions
param.help: Number of different initial starts to use with MCMC.

param.name: exact_cut
param.label: Exact cutoff
param.help: Maximum accumulated table probability to stop exact test.

param.name: binom_cut
param.label: Binomial cutoff
param.help: Minimum p-value cutoff for CoMEt to perform binomial test.

param.name: co_occur_cut
param.label: Co-occurrence cutoff
param.help: Maximum co-occurrence cutoff to perform exact test.
